alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 600 PM MST... At 514 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Carefree to McDowell Mountain Park to near Four Peaks. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Sugarloaf Mountain, Sycamore Creek, Ballantine Trailhead, Round Valley, East Mesa, Sunflower, Cave Creek, Carefree, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Lost Dutchman State Park and Goldfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 51 between mile markers 11 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 182 and 201. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 174 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
